name: livetraffic
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool adsbx_flight_sim_traffic.
Tool description: ADSBexchange.com traffic feed for flight simulators
API description: Retrieves information about all aircraft within a 25-nautical mile radius of the specified latitude and longitude.

lat.description: Latitude of the center point (-90 to 90).

lon.description: Longitude of the center point (-180 to 180). Note: Longitude in the US is typically negative.
